snippet.title: Streets of Fury : Extended edition - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Official website: http://www.streetsoffury.com
Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/350910

Fight the gangs of Paris in this action packed Beat'Em up. Up to 4 players can join in, to cooperate, or fight against each other! Many unlockables, game modes, crazy combos and devastating furies await you in this deep fighting game. 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Streets_of_Fury
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Streets-of-Fury/151892598194069
